headline.main: FROM UTAH.; The Mails Indian Troubles The Late Eclipse An Address from Brigham on Family Discipline.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our mails from the East and the West are improving. The Eastern mail, due last Tuesday, arrived a week ago,and the one due next Tuesday was distributed yesterday morning. This quick time is creditable to the mail carriers and very gratifying to the general public.

docs.snippet: The Board of Alderman, after a recess of six weeks, reassembled last evening.

docs.snippet: On Monday the Academy of Music opened its portals and gave to New-York the cheering conviction that the world of fashion, if not come, was at all events coming home. Everybody, as he entered, looked around the edifice, as after an absence about some...
docs.lead_paragraph: On Monday the Academy of Music opened its portals and gave to New-York the cheering conviction that the world of fashion, if not come, was at all events coming home. Everybody, as he entered, looked around the edifice, as after an absence about some "Yarrow Revisited," to which belonged associations more or less sentimental. Faces familar in the establishment last season were soughs out and recognized, congratulatory nods were interchanged.
